Job Title: Software / Product development opportunity For a leading MNC
Job Description: Hi,We are looking for a senior engineer/ technical lead for a leading MNC in Bangalore.Roles and Responsibilities  .1)   Candidates having experience 6-10years of exp in software development building complex enterprise systems 2)candidates having a broad experience in development technology like Java/Scala, C#/.Net and Go Lang 3)candidates having experience in Big Data processing technologies like Hadoop/Spark 4)candidate having experience in AWS and / or Azure5)candidates having experience with databases like SQL Server, PostgreSQL 6)candidates having experience in document stores like Elasticsearch or MongoDB 70candidate having experience in container technologies like docker, kubernetesIf interested please share your CV to Desired Candidate Profile Perks and Benefits
